title: Learning Design and Activity Analysis-Based Elementary Mathematics Teaching Competency Workshop for University Faculty

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Understanding of Elementary Mathematics Curriculum and Pedagogy, with Lesson Design Experience
context.additional_context: Current elementary school teachers participate to enhance mathematics teaching competencies. Practical activities using smartphones in limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Participants can analyze peer teachers’ mathematics learning design cases using semi-structured interview techniques.

Participants can develop a design plan applying seven types of learning activities (absorption, information management, application, communication, production, experience, and evaluation) to elementary mathematics instruction.
Participants can establish strategies to induce students’ mathematical ability development by designing formative assessment-centered learning activities.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
